This is a little replacement for the Textures of \"UNP Slave Leia Armor\" by sorajmoe

descriptionHtml:
UNP Slave Leia Armor Recoloring

This is a little replacement for the Textures of \"UNP Slave Leia Armor\" by sorajmoe
(Original Leia Mod made by neovinci / Created with permission.)

It change the color of the outfit to Steal/Metal and black to match some other clothes better.

Also included is a second recoloring to mintgreen/metal and purple (in the \"alternativ\" subfolder).

Requires: 
\"UNP Slave Leia Armor\" by sorajmoe
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7327

Useful (but not required) for this:
\"Nightingale retex - Black Sacrament - craftable ninja armor\" by AmethystDeceiver
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696

Have fun, tripex2011
author: triplex2011
